feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
